name: Acapella Master
description:
Welcome to Acapella Master, a unique and innovative music game that brings your vocal talents to the forefront! Immerse yourself in a world where your voice becomes the ultimate musical instrument. Designed for both amateurs and seasoned vocalists, Acapella Master allows you to create, record, and share your acapella creations with ease and flair.

  • Real-Time Recording: Use your webcam and microphone to record your voice in real-time, for later layering recordings to create complex and harmonious acapellas.
  • Custom Song Import: Bring your favorite songs into the mix! Import custom tracks and lay to create unique acapella versions of popular hits or your original compositions.
  • Intuitive Interface: Our user-friendly interface makes it easy for anyone to start creating music. No prior experience? No problem!
  • Easy to Share: Quickly export your videos to share them with anyone!
